item.title: Install Nerd Fonts in Linux
item.description: When working in Neovim you may require custom icons to display specific things (like file types in lualine, or icons in gitsigns). Most of these plugins rely on Nerd Fonts - project that patches developer-oriented fonts with additional icons.
